articles.author: LOLITA C. BALDOR, TARA COPP
articles.title: US and British strikes on Houthi sites in Yemen answer militants' surge in Red Sea attacks on ships - The Associated Press
articles.description: The U.S. and Britain have struck 18 Houthi targets in Yemen. The strikes on Saturday answer a recent surge in attacks by the Iran-backed militia group on ships in the Red Sea and Gulf of Aden. According to U.S. officials, American and British fighter jets hit…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) The U.S. and Britain struck 18 Houthi targets in Yemen on Saturday, answering a recent surge in attacks by the Iran-backed militia group on ships in the Red Sea and Gulf of Aden, incl… [+7283 chars]
